rows.title: Bluesky Social
rows.author: PixlCore
rows.description: Access your Bluesky social profile, read your timeline, make posts, leave likes, and more.

rows.title: Stagehand
rows.author: PixlCore
rows.description: An AI-powered browser automation framework for xyOps.  Drive a headless browser with simple English instructions, take actions, extract data, capture network requests, and even record a video of the whole session.

rows.title: AI Prompt
rows.author: PixlCore
rows.description: An AI plugin which lets you prompt any AI provider and LLM, including local models, and return the result.

rows.title: On Holiday
rows.author: UNICodehORN
rows.description: Skip or execute xyOps schedules on public holidays using OpenHolidaysAPI.

rows.title: Sun Trigger
rows.author: UNICodehORN
rows.description: Execute xyOps schedules based on sun using public sunset API.
